title: Spinach Puree Recipe for Babies, Spinach Sauce for Babies
content:
Healthy spinach puree to have on hand. You can add this to literally anything. A great way to feed kids and babies spinach.

Spinach puree is a healthy way to include spinach in your kid's diet. It is very recently I discovered this method. What I do is, as soon as I buy a bunch of spinach. I Clean them well in several changes of water. Drain them and cook them down. I then puree them and store them in the fridge. They stay good for 5 to 7 days. I use them throughout the week. I add them to dosa batter, chapati batter, curries.

I add this to dosa batter mainly and feed my 1-year daughter daily morning. She seems to love it.

 

Spinach Puree for Babies

 

Preparation  time

5 mins

 

Cook time

5 mins

 

Total time

10 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1.5 cups

 

Ingredients

Spinach / Palak - 3 cups

Water - ¼ cup

 

Instructions

Take spinach and wash well.

Take it in a saucepan, add water and cook for 5 mins.

Cool it and grind it to a smooth paste.

Store it in an airtight container in the fridge for 3 to 4 days.

You can add this to dosa batter, chapati flour or mix with rice along with salt and ghee.
